about.title: About
about.subTitle: Leading Real Estate Training in Hyderabad
about.description1: Welcome to Hyderabad School of Real Estate, where we transform aspiring professionals into successful real estate agents. With years of industry experience and expert trainers, we provide comprehensive education covering all aspects of the real estate business.
about.description2: Our curriculum includes RERA regulations, HMDA and DTCP guidelines, property documentation, sales techniques,Communication & marketing strategies tailored specifically for Hyderabad's dynamic real estate market.

faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our real estate training programs

items.question: What is the duration of the real estate training program?
items.answer: Our comprehensive real estate training program typically runs for 10 days and Timings are 10:30 AM to 1:30 PM.Lunch is also provided.

items.question: Do I need any prior experience in real estate?
items.answer: No prior experience is required! Our courses are designed for beginners as well as those looking to enhance their existing knowledge. We start from the basics and gradually move to advanced topics.

items.question: Will I receive a certification after completing the course?
items.answer: Yes! Upon successful completion of the program, you will receive an industry-recognized certification from Hyderabad School of Real Estate that will help you in your professional career.

items.question: What topics are covered in the curriculum?
items.answer: Our curriculum covers Real Estate Basics, RERA/HMDA/DTCP regulations, Sales & Marketing, Documentation, Legal aspects, Digital and Communication Skills, and practical field training with live property visits.

items.question: What are the fees for the course?
items.answer: We offer competitive and affordable fees of ‚Çπ9,999. Please contact us at 89775 33213 for detailed fee structure and any ongoing offers.

items.question: Do you provide job placement assistance?
items.answer: Yes, we provide 100% placement and  comprehensive career support  with  connections with leading real estate companies in Hyderabad.

items.question: Are there practical training sessions included?
items.answer: Absolutely! We believe in hands-on learning. Our program includes field visits, live property inspections, client interaction scenarios, and real-world case studies.

items.question: Can I attend classes on weekends?
items.answer: Yes, we offer both weekday and weekend batches to accommodate working professionals and students. You can choose the schedule that best fits your availability.
